name: Postjam: Pathway to Glory
description:
This is the fixed and working version of an entry to Game Makers Toolkit Gamejam 2022 https://llllkatjallll.itch.io/pathway-to-glory

Story

You are the trusty architect of ye good olde dungeon. 

Swathes of adventurers are on your doorstep, ready to venture into the dicey challenges you provide (within reason ofcourse, and a little comfort goes miles).

So give it your best shot, building every new hero a dungeon layout to their hearts desire and try to pull on their strings to make some money a long the way.
